TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SynchronizationContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供在各種同步處理模式中散佈同步處理內容的基本功能。

span.span: Provides the basic functionality for propagating a synchronization context in various synchronization models.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是基底類別，提供無限制執行緒的內容沒有同步處理。The class is a base class that provides a free-threaded context with no synchronization. 這個類別所實作的同步處理模型的目的是允許的 common language runtime 正常運作，不同的同步處理模型內部非同步/同步作業。The purpose of the synchronization model implemented by this class is to allow the internal asynchronous/synchronous operations of the common language runtime to behave properly with different synchronization models. 此模型也可簡化受管理的需求的一些應用程式必須遵循才能在不同的同步處理環境下正確運作。This model also simplifies some of the requirements that managed applications have had to follow in order to work correctly under different synchronization environments. 同步處理模型的提供者可以延伸此類別，並提供它們自己的實作，這些方法。Providers of synchronization models can extend this class and provide their own implementations for these methods. 如需有關同步處理內容的詳細資訊，請參閱文章[它是相關的 SynchronizationContext 所有](https://msdn.microsoft.com/magazine/gg598924.aspx)MSDN Magazine 中。For more information about synchronization contexts, see the article [It's All About the SynchronizationContext](https://msdn.microsoft.com/magazine/gg598924.aspx) in the MSDN Magazine.

summary.span: 取得目前執行緒的同步處理內容。

span.span: Gets the synchronization context for the current thread.

value.span: 物件，代表目前的同步處理內容。

span.span: A object representing the current synchronization context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可用於將傳播至另一個執行緒從同步處理內容。This property is useful for propagating a synchronization context from one thread to another.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會回應作業已經完成的通知。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, responds to the notification that an operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作不含任何程式碼。The default implementation contains no code. 您可以選擇性地覆寫此方法以提供作業完成時執行的程式碼。You can optionally override this method to provide code that executes when an operation is complete.

summary.span: 設定告知，表示需要等候告知，並準備回呼 (Callback) 方法，以便在發生等候狀況時，可以順利呼叫該方法。

span.span: Sets notification that wait notification is required and prepares the callback method so it can be called more reliably when a wait occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int Wait (IntPtr[] waitHandles, bool waitAll, int millisecondsTimeout);

Public Overridable Function Wait (waitHandles As IntPtr(), waitAll As Boolean, millisecondsTimeout As Integer) As Integer

abstract member Wait : nativeint[] * bool * int -> int override this.Wait : nativeint[] * bool * int -> int

param.name: waitHandles
param.span: 類型的陣列，包含原生作業系統控制代碼。

span.span: An array of type that contains the native operating system handles.

param.name: waitAll
param.span: 表示等候所有控制代碼， 則表示等候任何控制代碼。

span.span: to wait for all handles; to wait for any handle.

param.name: millisecondsTimeout
param.span: 要等候的毫秒數，如果要無限期等候，則為 (-1)。

span.span: The number of milliseconds to wait, or (-1) to wait indefinitely.

summary.span: 等候指定陣列中的任何元素或所有元素接收信號。

span.span: Waits for any or all the elements in the specified array to receive a signal.

returns.span: 滿足等候條件之物件的陣列索引。

span.span: The array index of the object that satisfied the wait.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫外部宣告執行 「 等待 」 活動。The method calls the external declaration to perform the wait activity. 覆寫方法來變更同步處理內容的等候行為。Override the method to change the wait behavior for the synchronization context.

span.span: is null.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成員不能由部分信任或不透明的程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: Helper 函式，等候指定陣列中的任何元素或所有元素接收信號。

span.span: Helper function that waits for any or all the elements in the specified array to receive a signal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是未受管理的外部協助程式函式宣告。 is a declaration for an unmanaged external helper function. 會呼叫方法等候信號，以指定的作業系統控制代碼。 is called by the method to wait for a signal for the specified operating system handles.
